verses.roman:
jaya jaya śrī-caitanya jaya dayāmaya
jayādvaita-priya nityānanda-priya jaya

synonyms: jaya jaya—all glories; śrī-caitanya—to Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; jaya—all glories; dayā-maya—to the most merciful; jaya—all glories; advaita-priya—to the dear master of Advaita Ācārya; nityānanda-priya—to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, who is very dear to Lord Nityānanda; jaya—all glories.
translation: All glories to Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, who is very merciful and who is very dear to Advaita Ācārya and Lord Nityānanda.
